did.unittitle: Department of African Studies, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of one audiocassette and a program of a Yale Department of African Studies alumni reunion and conference held in 2002.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Dept. of African Studies

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the curator of the African Collection, Yale University Library, 2002.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of African Studies, Yale University, Records (RU 912). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of one audiocassette and a program of a Yale Department of African Studies alumni reunion and conference held in 2002.
